showScoreExcerpt: "This is a play of ideas and, as such, there is more discourse than there is dramatic action, and characterizations do not run especially deep...Time is intentionally fluid in this work but, under Anne Kauffmanâ€™s otherwise thoughtful direction, leaps of many years feel more disjointed than they should be."
